About Me

Hi, my name is Nicolas Ortiz and I'm a photographer based in Ottawa, Ontario. I have been taking photos for over 4 years and have honed my skills through extensive travel and experience working with various clients.

I have a passion for capturing the beauty of the world around us and sharing it with others. I am always looking for new and exciting subjects to photograph and enjoy collaborating with clients to bring their vision to life.

Take a look at my work, learn about my process, and feel free to reach out if you'd like to connect. Let's create something amazing together.
